title: Notes on git
content: Moving files from local to repo. Untracked: edited but git doesn't do anything with it. Staged: (git add . || git add -A) stages the file aka git will bundle the change with the next commit. Committed: (git commit -m 'message') git has made a record of the change in a commit. Push: (git push) to move the files from local to repo.

title: Notes on dotenv
content: dotenv, define environment variables, it is a useful way to protect sensitive data from being easily accessible, use to hide API keys

title: npm packages
content: To initialize a package.json file that lists npm dependencies begin by typing the following into the terminal 'npm init -y', then 'npm install (package_name@version)'
